timeline.bodyText: I am not quite sure about the use of memoize. As the first argument passed to the memoized function is the cache key by default, what is the cache key for below async call which does not take any argument ? Will we always get the cached result despite having different remote searches ?

replies.bodyText: The thinking here is that the list of Remote Searches changes very infrequently, and even if they changed mid-session for someone then the impact of missing that change would be very minimal. So best to simply memoize and save the unnecessary traffic to/from the server. Similar reasoning was applied with getMimeTypeViewerConfiguration in the MimeTypesModule.

timeline.bodyText: May I ask why this effect depends on setRemoteSearches ? I think setRemoteSearches will not reference to a new function that updates the state as long as the component is alive in one lifecycle. Is depending on remoteSearchesSupplier  enough ?
